data.client_settings: Discord Canary macOS 0.0.156, Discord stable macOS 0.0.248
data.actual_result: Clyde says "You can't change your nickname in a server!"
data.expected_result: The command is unusable, as it doesn't populate in the slash commands list in a DM.
data.short_description: Using /nick in a DM gives a server-based error message
data.steps_to_repro: - Open up a DM - Try changing your nickname using the /nick command
